A high efficiency fiber-coupled diode laser system in the 960-1060 nm wavelength. Used to generate high power heat source for laser cladding and laser heat treatment applications with the ability to closed-loop control with peak temperature sensing. Used for cost-effective, efficient and reliable laser welding, cladding and heat-treatment applications.
